content.raw:
I’m not entirely sure what the pathology would be here, but I did notice that I can run two ignition instances in different docker containers and they will interact with each other \(no doubt because of net=host\). There is a chance that all of our ignition instances were interacting with each other over our internal network.

Maybe the service discovery mechanisms are really eager…
